SA14kamvchtu:503: nāsti pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca vyatiricya pramāṇamityanyatra vicāritam /
SA14kamvchtu:505: bādhakapramāṇaṃ tāvannirākriyate- yadyevamātmā skandhebhyo 'bhinnastadā skandhavat kṣāṇikaḥ syād athavā skandhāḥ khalvātmavannityāḥ syuḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:510: atha skandhebhyo bhinna ātmā iṣyate tadā sukhādināsambaddhatve na sidhyet tasya bhoktṛtvādikam /
SA14kamvchtu:511: tatra prayogaḥ- yo nāsti sukhaduḥkhādibhiḥ sambaddhaḥ sa nāsti kartā vā bhoktā vā,
SA14kamvchtu:514: ātmāpi tathārthakriyādibhirna kathañcanāpi sambadha iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:516: tathā hi- sukhādinā hi sambandhe sati ādhārādheyalakṣaṇo vā saṃyogalakṣaṇo vā kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇo veti pakṣatrayam /
SA14kamvchtu:519: tathā hi- adhaḥprasarpaṇadharmiṇāṃ jalādīnāmadhogamanapratibandhakatvena vyavasthāpyate tāvadādhāraḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:526: sthiteḥ pṛthakatve sati sā naiva tāvatsthāturupakārikā arthāntarabhūtatvāttasyāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:531: anyathā tena bhaṅga eva tasya syānna tāvadavasthānam /
SA14kamvchtu:538: evaṃ ca naivopapadyate tāvad bhinnārthena bhinnārthasya saṃyogaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:540: api ca, saṃyogabalena yadi ātmā sukhī vā duḥkhī vā bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:543: tata evātmanā sahaikatve sukhādinā naiva syāt kaścit sukhī vā duḥkhī vā /
SA14kamvchtu:544: adarśane 'pi balenābhyupagate niścaye tenaiva niścitaḥ syāttadā kiṃ tāvat saṃyogaparikalpanayā,
SA14kamvchtu:546_0: sambandhibhedena bhinnāyāmapi prajñaptau paramārthataḥ bhāvānāmabhinnasvabhāve sati
SA14kamvchtu:546_1: kathaṃ svabhāvabhedāśritaḥ pṛthagarthakriyābhedaḥ syāditi kumatiparikalpita evāyaṃ khalu sambandhaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:549: avikale hetau sati na yujyate tāvat kādācitkakāryasambhavaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:553: duḥkhotpādahetutvād yadi baddhastadā sarvathā baddhatvānnaiva muktaḥ syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:556: aduḥkhāvasthotpādahetutvād yadi muktastadā vimukta eva bhavenna kadācidapi baddhaḥ syāttadā kathaṃ tāvat kalpyeta ādheyanibandhanaṃ bandhamokṣatvamiti /
SA14kamvchtu:557: yadi caitanyādilakṣaṇatvenotpādasāmarthyena vā kartā syāttadā kartā eva sadā bhavet katha tāvad bhoktā?
SA14kamvchtu:558: atha sukhādyutpādahetutvena yadi bhoktā syāttadā bhoktaiva bhavet kathaṃ tāvat kartā?
SA14kamvchtu:563: na khalu hetumātratayā kartā vā bhoktā vā,
SA14kamvchtu:578: ata eva yāvantaḥ paraparikalpitā ākāśādayo 'kṣaṇikābhāvāste sarve arthakriyāsāmarthyahitatvād abhāvavyavahāraviṣayā ucyante paramavicakṣaṇairbauddhairiti /
SA14kamvchtu:583: iti nāma vyavahāre sati nāsti nāmni vivādaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:584: tathāpi arthakriyārthino hi prekṣāvantaḥ [Vajraṭ_121] tathāvidhānupalambhasvabhāve vandhyāputrādyaviśeṣe ca bhāvavyavahāro na yujyata ityāhuḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:590: vinaśvaratve sati skandhāntargatā eva pudgalāḥ prasajyeran,
SA14kamvchtu:592: athāvinaśvaratve tāvat skandhāntargatadharmavisadṛśatvādarthāntarā eva te bhaveyuriti doṣo 'yamuktapūrva eva /
SA14kamvchtu:599: pāramitāyogamadhikṛtyāha- api tu khalu punaḥ ityādi /
SA14kamvchtu:602: dānam ityanena trividhadānamadhikṛtya ṣaṭ pāramitā darśitāḥ na tu dānamātram /
SA14kamvchtu:608: prajñāyāścābhāve sa tad viparītatayā dharmaṃ deśayet /
SA14kamvchtu:611: dānaṃ dātavyam ityanena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ kathaṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:612: na vastupratiṣṭhitena ityādinātra yogasamāpattyā [Vajraṭ_122] kathaṃ pratipattavyamityāveditam /
SA14kamvchtu:613: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena dānaṃ dātavyam ityādinā vikṣepaṃ nigṛhya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityetannirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:614: tatra na vastupratiṣṭhiteneti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogasya yāthāvattvaṃ tāvannirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:620: tathā hi- paraiḥ paramārthataḥ iṣṭā vijñānavyatiriktā arthāstāvānna pratyakṣasiddhāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:622: arthe sati sākāreṇa nirākāreṇa anyākāreṇa vā jñānena grahaṇamiti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:623: tatra tāvanna sākāreṇa citravarṇādidarśanakāle ekajñānābhinnatvādākāraṇāmapyekatvaṃ prasajyeta,
SA14kamvchtu:629: citrākāravyavasthāpanāyai anekajñānotpādaparikalpanayāpi jñānasya viṣayaṃ vyāpya sthitatvād grāhakajñānānāmutpādo 'pi na sambhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:631: anyacca, sārūpyaṃ tāvadekadeśena bhavet sarvātmanā vā /
SA14kamvchtu:632: tatra na tāvat sarvātmanā- arthajjñānasyāpi jaḍasvabhāvaprasaṅgāt /
SA14kamvchtu:634: vyāvṛttibhedenāṃśopacāre 'pi vastvādisārupyadharmāṇāṃ sarvatra [Vajraṭ_123] vidyamānatvāt sarveṇa sarvamavagamyeta /
SA14kamvchtu:635: atha tadutpannaṃ tatsārūpyaṃ cetyetaddvayena vedayatīti arthasārupyasya samanastarapratyayasyāpi grāhakatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:636: satyapi sārūpye paramārthataḥ bāhyārtho na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:652: anekatve saṃghātasya paramāṇureva sa syānna tvarthāntaraḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:659: viśeṣasya kasyacidabhyupagame sa eva tāvat sākāratvābhyupagamaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:660: pratītisvabhāvamātre tāvad viśeṣābhāvājjñānātmani nākārātiriktaṃ bhedakamanyat syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:663: evaṃ hi sati rūpaviṣayakamākāravijñānaṃ tāvat parīkṣāmarhati,
SA14kamvchtu:664: tathā hi- na tāvat pratyakṣato 'rthaḥ sidhyati,
SA14kamvchtu:666: apratyakṣasyārthasya jñānasya ca kenāpi hetunā sambandhāsiddheḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:671: na tāvat paramārthataḥ jñānasvabhāvatā pratyakṣeṇa sidhyati,
SA14kamvchtu:676: na, tvanmate tābhyāṃ saha tasya kasyacidapi sambandhasyāsiddhatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:680: parokṣeṇa saha sambandhastu na kenāpyarvāgdarśinā grahītuṃ śakyate /
SA14kamvchtu:688: ata eva paramārthataḥ bhāvasvabhāvasādhakaṃ kiñcidapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti,
SA14kamvchtu:690: ityevaṃ tāvat- yadekānekasvabhāvavigataṃ tat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvam,
SA14kamvchtu:701: tathā hi- anekasmin vibhajyamāne sati vibhaktāḥ paramāṇava eva syuḥ tataśca paurvāparyāvasthānaṃ na syānniravayavatvāt paramāṇūnām,
SA14kamvchtu:703: tato diśaṃ vyāpya avasthitā na pratibhāseran /
SA14kamvchtu:711: yathāsaṃkhyam anekavijñānāni yugapat pravartanta ityapi vaktuṃ na yujyate niravayavānāmamūrtānāṃ khalu paurvāparyāvasthiterayuktatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:715: sati caivaṃ kathaṃ te tatra bhāseran mṛṣāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:717: tasya jñānagatadharmatve sati mithyākārāṇāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantābhyāvaḥ syāditi kathamavabhāseranniti /
SA14kamvchtu:718: tataḥ prakāśātmakākārebhyaḥ mṛṣātvenābhyupetebhyaḥ kastāvadanyaḥ jñānasvabhāvaḥ sadbhūtaste 'vaśiṣyate,
SA14kamvchtu:721: nīlādīnāṃ svasvabhāvād bhinnaṃ yadanyat prakāśarūpamiti sadbhūtaṃ kimapi nāti,
SA14kamvchtu:727: tayostāvat tādātmyalakṣaṇo vā tadutpattilakṣaṇo vā sambandha eva nāsti /
SA14kamvchtu:734: ata eva yathā yathārthāścityante viśīryante tathā tathā /
SA14kamvchtu:741: dṛśyate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam /
SA14kamvchtu:745: yathaiva ārdraṃ kadalīyaskandhaṃ sārārthikaḥ puruṣu vipāṭayet /
SA14kamvchtu:746: bahirvā adhyātma na sāramasti tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
SA14kamvchtu:749: evaṃ dānādiṣu yathā yogastathā ādarśitaḥ, nānyatra /
SA14kamvchtu:750: yadi paramārthata kasyacidapi vastuno bhāvābhāvād vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ na dātavyam,
SA14kamvchtu:751: tadā avastvabhiniveśena tu dānasya kathaiva kā,
SA14kamvchtu:756: tato vastuno 'bhāve 'pi tāvadabhiniveśo na yujyata evetyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:757: na rūpapratiṣṭhitena ityādinā bodhisattvena na kvacitpratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyamityeva vistareṇābhihitam /
SA14kamvchtu:761: anutpādādayo vikalpā api na karaṇīyā iti nidarśanārtha subhūte,
SA14kamvchtu:766: ata eva na kvacit pratiṣṭhitena iti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:775: prathamapakṣe kenāpi kasyacidapi deyasyābhāvāt puṇyābhāvaḥ prasajyate,
SA14kamvchtu:777: bodhisattvaiḥ yo hi sattvārthaṃ śrama āsthitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:783: anyathā kathaṃ bhagavatārthijanebhyaḥ putrādayaḥ pradattā iti sarvāṇyetāni codyāni manasi nidhāya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:786: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- samyagdṛṭivihitāni dānādīni suviśuddhatayā viśiṣṭeṣṭaphalāni abhinirvartayanti,
SA14kamvchtu:796: ata eva anupalambhapratiṣṭhitāni dānādīni samyagdṛṣṭisambhūtānīti vipaścitsu prasādātiśayaṃ janayanti, nānyeṣu /
SA14kamvchtu:797: tataśca dānādiṣvapravṛttatayā puṇyābhāvo deyādīnāṃ caikāntābhāvo neṣyate,
SA14kamvchtu:802: tadā dānādiṣu pravṛttirnābhyupeyate prayogāvasthāyāṃ [Vajraṭ_129] vyutthitāvasthāyāṃ vā kriyayopālambho na yujyate /
SA14kamvchtu:812_0: tadabhāvānna rūpapratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyamiti bodhisattvaḥ tathāgatarūpakāyāptikāmanayā
SA14kamvchtu:812_1: dānādiṣu kathaṃ pravarteteti cediti codyamāśaṅkaya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādinā
SA14kamvchtu:814: lakṣaṇasampadā iti nimittamātrābhidhānena tathāgatasya nikhilo rūpakāyaḥ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairalaṅkṛtaḥ paridīpitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:815: tatra lakṣaṇāni tāvat cakrāṅkahastapādatādīni dvātriṃśat padabāhulyabhiyā nollikhyante,
SA14kamvchtu:821: ata eva tathāvidhe rūpakāye chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdeśaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:822: athemāni lakṣaṇāni paramāṇusañcayasvabhāvāni vā tadārabdhāvayavirūpāṇi vā bhaveyuriti?
SA14kamvchtu:829: etad vicintya subhūtirāha no hīdam iti vyaktīkṛtam /
SA14kamvchtu:830: yadi lakṣaṇāni mṛṣā bhaveyustarhi kathaṃ bhagavatā tattatsūtreṣu lakṣaṇāni samupadiṣṭānīti cintayan tatkasya hetoḥ iti pṛṣṭvaivaṃ saivālakṣaṇasampad ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:855: tatrānāgate puruṣeṣu pañcakaṣāyāṇāmādhikyādevaṃvidhadharmaratnasya atyantagambhīrodāraphalatvāt pravacanadharmakāye 'nāptatvāśaṅkayā asti iti pṛṣṭavān /
SA14kamvchtu:856: asti iti padaṃ tu kecit sattvāḥ ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti ityarthapadena yojyam /
SA14kamvchtu:857: paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyām ityatra śatānāṃ pañcakaṃ pañcaśatī,
SA14kamvchtu:871: arthato 'viparyayastasaṃjñaivātra bhūtasaṃjñetyabhidhīyate na tu śabdābhiniveśamātram 'ayaṃ bhūtaḥ'; iti saṃjñā /
SA14kamvchtu:874: pratyakṣavad dṛṣṭavā bhagavān sūbhūtisaśayaṃ parihartuṃ bhaviṣyanti ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:879: yathā vā bhūtasaṃjñayā saṃjñitāstān bhagavān paridīpitaṃvān /
SA14kamvchtu:880: śīlavantaḥ guṇavantaḥ prajñāvantaśca ityanena tu kramaśo 'dhiśīlādhicittādhiprajñāśceti śikṣātrayapratiprattisamanvitāḥ nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:883: kleśavati paścimakāle tu kathaṃ tathāvidhaśīlādiguṇavanto bhaviṣyantīti cintayitvā sūbhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:886: avaropitakuśalamūlāḥ tāvadavavādamanuśāsanīṃ ca śirasādāya śīlādiguṇasampadbhyaḥ prayatnavanto draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:887: teṣāṃ tato 'pi bahutaraṃ puṇyamabhidhātuṃ anekabuddhaśatasahasraḥ ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:894: anyathā sarveṣāṃ jñānāt jñānāt sarvajño bhagavāniti deśanayā ko viśeṣo darśito bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:895: athavā tatteṣāṃ bhavyatvaṃ yat tatpramukhaṃ kṛtvā deśanā pravartitetyavagantavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:897: atasteṣāmaśeṣaṃ puṇyaskandhasaṅgrahaṃ darśayituṃ sarve te sattvāḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:900: ebhiḥ sarvairabhūtasaṃjñāṃ nirākṛtya bhūtasaṃgyotpādane chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamityādarśitaṃ tathā sthānasyāsyaudāryamapi paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:902: te anekabuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitāḥ kathaṃ jñāsyanta iti jñāpakahetau paripṛṣṭe 'tra teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:903: anena tavat yogasamāpattau kathaṃ pratittavyamityetat prakāśitam,
SA14kamvchtu:909: yadi nāsti ātmādisaṃjñā tarhi kiṃ śrāvakādivad asti rūpādidharmasaṃjñā?
SA14kamvchtu:914: iti cintāyāṃ evaṃ nādharmasaṃjñā pravartate ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:915: saṃvṛtau avicāraramaṇīyatayā dharmāṇāṃ sadbhāvāt saṃvṛtipathasthitebhyastāvad adharmasaṃjñā naiva yuktimatī,
SA14kamvchtu:917: tanniṣedhānna kaścid dharma upalabhyate yatrādharmasaṃjñā pravarteta,
SA14kamvchtu:920: tadyathā satye 'pi vijñaptimātre vijñaptimātrateyamiti vikalpayan na vijñaptimātratāyāṃ sthitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:922: yadyātmādīnāmasattvaṃ tadā tatra tatsaṃjñāyā apravṛtau satyāṃ 'ātmaiva rūpamidam';
SA14kamvchtu:923: ityādikaṃ nāmamātramiti nāmābhiniveśasaṃjñā teṣāṃ bhavediti matvā saṃjñāpi ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:927: yadyevaṃ tarhi tasyāmavasthāyāṃ sarvasaṃjñāvigamād mṛta-nirodhasamāpannapudgalavad yogino 'bhāva eva syāditi nāpi..... nāaṃjñā pravartate ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:932: yad yogijñānaṃ saṃvṛtisvabhāvaṃ tat kenāvagamyata iti cet?
SA14kamvchtu:941: niḥsvabhāvatāvicāreṇa tadgocarībhūtānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyena nairātmasaṅgrahāt yā khalu vyavasthā saiva yugapadulambhanam /
SA14kamvchtu:946: tasmāt sati nairātmyadvayāvabodhe teṣāmanekaśatasahasrabuddhānāṃ paryupāsanaṃ pratīyate /
SA14kamvchtu:948: sa tu saṃsāre na ucito bhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:949: anayā yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ kīdṛśyā ca bhūtasaṃjñayā tat saṃjñātavyamiti saṃdarśitaṃ tadgāmbhīryamityapi ca paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:950: ātmādīnāmasattve teṣāmātmādisaṃjñāyā abhāvāt padasamudāyādibhiḥ ātmatva sūktaṃ duraktaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ dharmādharmasaṃjñaṃ kiṃ teṣu niyamena na pravartate?
SA14kamvchtu:951: naivam, yadi bodhisattvānā na bhavet tatra saṃjñā, (tarhi)
SA14kamvchtu:952: ayuktayupapannatīrthakaradharmān parityajya bhagavaddeśiteṣu dharmeṣu tadadhigamāya kathaṃ chanda utpādanīya ityāśaṅkāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:954: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- ekānekasvabhāvavicāreṇa yathā rūpādilakṣaṇadharmā na saṃvidyante,
SA14kamvchtu:956: yatra dharmasaṃjñā tatrātmādisaṃjñā api niścayena naiva prahīṇā,
SA14kamvchtu:958: dharmanimittagrāhakamanasikārasya [Vajraṭ_136] tasyā eva manasikārarūpatvāt maitrīprabhṛtiṣu tattvamanasikārāsadbhāve nātmadṛṣṭiḥ parihīyate /
SA14kamvchtu:961: api ca, bodhisattvānāṃ sā dharmasaṃjñā yadyavaśyamanutpannadarśanamārgaḥ syāt tathā sati tena kathamātmādisaṃjñā prahīṇā syāt?
SA14kamvchtu:963: ataḥ sarvametat parīkṣya sa eva teṣāmātmagrāho bhavet ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:965: anyathā tayorbhinnākāratvāt kathaṃ dharmasaṃjñaiva ātmagrāhaḥ syāditi /
SA14kamvchtu:967: evaṃ sati tattatsūtreṣu kathaṃ bhagavatā bodhisattvebhyaḥ saddharmaḥ parigrāhayiṣyate?
SA14kamvchtu:973: abhipretasiddhyarthaṃ kolopamadeśitasya lakṣaṇasya na grahaṇaniṣedha ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:974: tasmāt ityādinā sa evārthaḥ padāntarai prayuktaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:975: yato hi sarvo dharmo 'dharmaśca satya ityabhiniveśasya viparītābhiniveśatvād,
SA14kamvchtu:976: yuktyopapanno ya āgamasamūhaḥ saṃsārārṇavottaraṇāya proktaḥ kolopamaḥ sa (yadā)
SA14kamvchtu:977: pāraṃ gatvā niṣprayojanatvāt parityājyo bhavati, kimu (tadā)
SA14kamvchtu:980: anyathā dharmādharmādikaṃ yadi satyasvabhāvaṃ syāt tadā paramārthaviṣayatvāt tadabhiniveśasya saṃsārapāragateṣvapi yuktisahaṃ [Vajraṭ_137] syāditi,

SA14kamvchtu:1003: tathyasaṃvṛtisvabhāvaṃ tu tathāgatasya jñānahetuṃ jñānadharmakāyaṃ prāptuṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca pradarśite /

SA14kamvchtu:1007: saṃvṛtisvabhāvastvevam- sambodhiḥ samboddhavyaṃ deśanā deśitavyamityādayaḥ sarve paryāyāḥ /

SA14kamvchtu:1012: dharmadeśanā ca na sta iti cintāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ? iti /

SA14kamvchtu:1019: nanu syuḥ sarve bhāvā agrāhyāḥ anabhilāpyāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1020: tathāpi svalakṣaṇadhāraṇāt paramārthataḥ dharmasvabhāvatāsthitā evetyāśaṅkāyāṃ na sa dharmaḥ ityāha /

SA14kamvchtu:1036: abhisandhāya tathāgatena asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitā āryaśrāvakā iti deśitam,
SA14kamvchtu:1050: bhāvagrahaṇābhāvena tadabhāvarūpatve sati bhāvagrāha eva tāvat prasajyate /

SA14kamvchtu:1057: ataḥ abhāvarūpatvena dharmeṣu sattvādatattvameva svabhāvena tat /
SA14kamvchtu:1061: ata eva teṣu āryasandhinirmocanādiṣu- 'na tattvasya bhāvāditaro 'rthaḥ'; ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1062: ata eva na dharmo nādharmaḥ ityuvāca /
SA14kamvchtu:1067: yadi bhagavato 'bhisambodhirvā dharmadeśanā vā nāsti kaściod dharmaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1068_0: kathaṃ tarhi bodhisattvena puṇyahetudharmakāyaṃ prāptukāmena saddharmaparigrahe 'nupravartitavyamiti
SA14kamvchtu:1068_1: vicintya puṇyahetudharmakayakāmatācchandotpādanāya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1073: tato nidānam iti ratnadānānāṃ nidānāt tataḥ puṇyodbhavaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1087: prajñaptisattvāt skandhānāṃ na puṇyaskandho bhāvarūpeṇa sambhavati /

SA14kamvchtu:1091: ata eva na puṇyaskandhaḥ paramārthato vidyate /

SA14kamvchtu:1107: tathāgatānāṃ puṇyahetukadharmakāyasya tu kathaiva keti nirdiśyate /

SA14kamvchtu:1124: iti pṛcchāyām ato nirjātā hi subhūte,
SA14kamvchtu:1126: evaṃ [Vajraṭ_143] bahutaraṃ puṇyam iti tacca bṛhatphalatvāttat bahutaraṃ puṇyam,
SA14kamvchtu:1128: ratnanirjātaṃ tatpuṇyaṃ tu mahāparibhogādi gauṇasāaṃsārikaṃ phalaṃ prāpayati /
SA14kamvchtu:1131: dharmadānena tāvadakṣayāpratimatathāgatapadaprāpteḥ tanmahattvaṃ kimiti na prasaktam?
SA14kamvchtu:1132: yathā dharmeṇānugraho na tathā ratnaiḥ pareṣāmanugrahaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1133: tathā hi parebhyaḥ samprakāśitena kramaśo 'nena dharmeṇa kṣiprameva buddhatvapadaṃ labhyate,
SA14kamvchtu:1135: ata eva parebhyaḥ parānugrāhakatvād ratnadānād dharmadānaṃ viśiṣṭamityābhisandhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1138: tāni tāvad daśa caritāni- lekhanaṃ pūjanaṃ dānaṃ vācanaṃ śravaṇam udgrahaṇam samprakāśanaṃ svādhyāyaḥ cintanaṃ bhāvanā ceti /
SA14kamvchtu:1139: ato nirjātāśca buddhā bhagavantaḥ iti saṃvṛtau etānyāśritya buddhāḥ prajñaptā iti [Vajraṭ_144] vākyaśeṣaḥ paramārthatastu bodhiḥ buddhaśca bhinnau na staḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1140: anena tāvat puṇyasya paramavaiśiṣṭayaparidīpanena tadutpādayituṃ chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1141: yadi paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpāda eva tadā sarve buddhadharmā apyanutpannā eva bhaveyuḥ tatkatham ato nirjātā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti?
SA14kamvchtu:1142: na buddhānāṃ bodherbhinnatvamiti vicārya tatkasya heto?
SA14kamvchtu:1145: buddhaprajñaptihetukā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhilakṣaṇā dharmā eva hi buddhadharmāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1147: apitu prajñaptihetutvād ato nirjātā buddhaḥ ityuktamityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1149: saṃvṛtimāśritya tathāgatānāmanusamyaksaṃbodhistu ato nirjātā ityādinā tathāgatena bhāṣitā,
SA14kamvchtu:1151: ata eva tattaditarapakṣebhyaḥ buddhadharmā iti paramārthato naiva vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1154: atra kecidāhuḥ kathaṃ tridhā bhinno 'yaṃ dharmakāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1156: prajñaptyā ca pravacanasvabhāvo dharmakāya iti ced?
SA14kamvchtu:1157: tathā sati rūpakāyo 'pi tatprāpteranurūpahetutvāt tatprāpakahetutvācca dharmakāyaḥ syāditi /
SA14kamvchtu:1159: bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ dharmakāyastu pariśuddhajñānasvabhāvastathā yā ca tasya sāmānyadharmatā,
SA14kamvchtu:1162: na cātra pravacanapuṇyayorupacāreṇa dharmaḥ iti deśanāpi /
SA14kamvchtu:1166: svasāmānyalakṣaṇadhāraṇād dharmā iti yat vyākhyātaṃ tat sarvadharmasādhāraṇamiti na rūpakāyastathāgatatvena nirdiṣṭaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1168: prajñaptita ityucyamāne 'pi na rūpakāyo dharmakāyatvena prasakto bhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:1170: buddhānāṃ rūpikāyo hi puṇyaṃ sambhṛtya jāyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1175: sambhāralakṣaṇapuṇyanicayasyāpi tatprāptihetutvāt prajñaptyā dharmakāya ityucyamāno 'pi yujyata eveti alamadhikena /
SA14kamvchtu:1176: anyat kucodyaṃ yuktamayuktaṃ veti vicakṣaṇairviveciyiṣyata iti matvā padabāhulyabhiyā na likhyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1178: itaḥ paraṃ dvādaśavipakṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣāṇi dvādaśasthānāni yathākramaṃ veditavyāni /
SA14kamvchtu:1194: tatra bhagavatā dharmapudgalayorvistareṇa nairātmye deśite 'pi anādikālīnadṛḍhātmābhiniveśasañcayabalena yadi kaścidevaṃ manyeta- yasya sattvādisaṃjñā pravartate,
SA14kamvchtu:1196: evaṃ tarhi yaduktaṃ bhagavatā 'tasmin kāle 'haṃ vīradatto nāma nṛpo 'bhavam,
SA14kamvchtu:1197: '; yuṣmabhyaṃ mayā dharmo deśayiṣyate ityādi kathaṃ syāt /

SA14kamvchtu:1199: asyāyamatra sāmānyato 'rthaḥ- ye mama mṛduśrāvakāḥ srotaāpannatvādiṣu dharmanairātmyānadhigamād aprāptarasānubhavāḥ,

SA14kamvchtu:1214: ityanena tāvadarthataḥ mayā prāptamiti vipakṣatvena paridītyate /

SA14kamvchtu:1217: āryasubhūtirapi bhagavato 'bhiprāyaṃ nirdiśan paramārthasthāpannārthaṃ tatra yogasamāpattiṃ ca grahītuṃ na hi sa bhagavan kañcid (dharmaṃ)
SA14kamvchtu:1228: sthiterabhāvāt kenāpi kathamapi tanna prāptuṃ śakyate /

SA14kamvchtu:1231: api ca, prāpyaprāpakabhāvaḥ khalu bhinnakālikaḥ samakāliko vā syāt /

SA14kamvchtu:1248: teṣāṃ sarvātmanā saṃyoge sati ekatvaṃ prasajyate,
SA14kamvchtu:1251: nairantaryeṇāvasthāne 'pi na bhavituṃ śaknoti ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:1258: śeṣeṇa rūpādinā ca dharmāyatanaikadeśena ca saṃskṛtā nirdiśyante /
SA14kamvchtu:1264: yadi mayā prāptamityabhiniveśastadā kathaṃ nocyeta srota āpanna iti vicintya saced bhagavan ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1268: sa pṛthagjana iti kathaṃ syāt srota-āpanna ityabhisandhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1273: amumevārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntāntare prapañcya nirdeṣṭuṃ sakṛdāgāminaḥ ityādyāha /

SA14kamvchtu:1282: santateśca prajñaptau sattvānna sa kaścana paramārthataḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1285: padaprayojyamātmānamadhikṛtya viśiṣṭatvena araṇāvihārīti sādhāraṇaguṇatvena arhanniti ca 'ahamasmi';

SA14kamvchtu:1289: tato vyutthāya tamālambya taditareṣu nopajāyante raṇāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1293: na māṃ vyākariṣyat iti tadā aprahīṇatvādātmadṛṣṭermayā srota-āpattiphalamapi durlabham,
SA14kamvchtu:1295: kathamaraṇāyāṃ vihartavyamiti cintāyāṃ na kvacid viharati ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1296: prāptaṃ mayā kiñcat saṃkṛtamaṃskṛtaṃ vetyevamabhiniveśena yo 'sthitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1299: adhunā ahamasmi bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena araṇāvihāriṇāmagryo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1300: ahamasmi bhagavan arhan vītarāgaḥ iti nātmābhiniveśena,
SA14kamvchtu:1305: nanvasati kasmiṃścidapi prāpye prāpake vā paramārthataḥ,

SA14kamvchtu:1308_2: dharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṅkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ? iti /

SA14kamvchtu:1313: [Vajraṭ_152] tathāpi tathāgatānubhāvena nānāpadasamudāyādīnāṃ jñānāvabhāsotpādamatre udgṛhītaḥ ityupacaryate,
SA14kamvchtu:1315: anenārthataḥ 'bodhisattvena śrutaparyeṣaṇakāle buddhotpāda ārādhanīyastadanantaraṃ buddhadharmā udgṛhītavyāḥ';
SA14kamvchtu:1321: ityanena paramārthataḥ dharmāṇāmagrāhyatvaṃ vyavasthāpya tatra yogasamāpattiḥ vikṣepanigrahaśca nirdiṣṭau /
SA14kamvchtu:1324_0: yadi paramārthataḥ karmakartrādayo na syustadā kathaṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrapariśodhanārthaṃ
SA14kamvchtu:1327: bhagavān bodhisattvānāṃ tattatkṣetrapariśuddhisampadaṃ kathamuktavāniti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1330: avyūhāste iti paramāṇubhirābdho 'vayavibhūto vā nāsti kaścid vyūhaḥ paramārthata ityavyūhā eva te,
SA14kamvchtu:1331: tathāpi svapnopalabdhakṣetravyūhavad avicāraramaṇīyamātra saṃvṛtisattvamuktaṃ tenocyante kṣetravyūhāḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1334: evāṃ muṣitasmṛtikānāmupakārāya upasaṃhāropayena smārayituṃ tasmād ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1336: kasyacidapi vastunaḥ siddherabhāvāt tatra 'apratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam'; ityarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1338: tatra vitathaṃ vadet ityanenārthataḥ paramārthataḥ mayā kṣetravyūho niṣpādyata ityabhiniveśo vipakṣatvena paridīpitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1341: hīnālambanamanasikārabhāvanāṃ prati chandaḥ praṇidhānamapi [na karttavyamityapi] nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:1342: avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ ityanena paramārthavyavasthāpanena yogasamāpattau pravṛttiḥ gambhīratā ca nirdiśyete /
SA14kamvchtu:1343: tenocyante kṣetravyūhāḥ ityanenāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1346: skandhebhyaḥ pṛthaktvenāsattve 'pi kiṃ nābhinnā eva sattvāḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1349: tasmāt sattvopekṣālakṣaṇavighnabhūtād visaṃyogārtham aṣṭamasthānamadhikṛtya tadyathāpi nāma ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1353: kimarthaṃ deśitaṃ bhagavatetyabhiprāyaṃ vaktukāmanayā tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1355: tameva abhiprāyaṃ vaktumāha- na bhāvaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1357: svapnadṛṣṭa iva sa ātmabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ proktastathāgatena,
SA14kamvchtu:1362: anyathā paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi dharmasyāsiddhatvāt tathā nocyetetyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1363: abhāvaṃ tāvad bhāvatvenābhyupagacchatāṃ teṣāṃ jaiminyādīnāṃ pratiṣedhārtham na sa bhāvaḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1364: abhāvasya tu bhāvavyatirekeṇa sthitalakṣaṇatvāt kathaṃ tadviparītasvabhāvo na syāt?
SA14kamvchtu:1367: tato 'yamabhāvatvena deśitaḥ sumerumātraparimāṇo 'pi ya ātmabhāvo yadā niḥsvabhāvatvāt paramārthato nāsti,
SA14kamvchtu:1368: tadā kathaṃ parātmabhāvaḥ sasvabhāvaḥ sātmako vā bhavet?
SA14kamvchtu:1369: atrārthataḥ sattvaparipākāyodyamaratānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sattvābhiniveśaḥ paramārthataḥ vipakṣatvena pradarśitaḥ tatprahāṇāya chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe /
SA14kamvchtu:1371: na bhāvaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ityanena tāvat paramārthaṃ vyasthāpya yogasamāpattisthānaṃ gambhīratvaṃ ca paridīpite /
SA14kamvchtu:1372: na sa bhāvaḥ ityanena tu vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1374: sampratyasya dharmaparyāyasya mahārthatvapratipādanena bāhyaśāstreṣvabhiniviṣṭānāṃ tatrānunayavikṣepaparihārārthaṃ navamasthānamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase sūbhūte ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1375: [Vajraṭ_155] anena tāvat caturbhiḥ prakārairasya dharmaparyāyasya vaiśiṣṭyaṃ paridīpyatepuṇyaparigrahaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1379: tatra puṇyaparigrahastu yadāha tato nidānaṃ bahupuṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1380: devādibhiḥ satkārastu yadāha sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ caityabhūtyabhūto bhaved iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1381: duṣkarakṛtyavidhānaṃ tu yadāha parameṇa te āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1382: tathāgatāditulyatākaraṇaṃ tu yadāha tasmiṃśca pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharatyanyatarānyataro vā vijñagurusthānīyaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1383: tatra ratnadānasya puṇyābhidhānaṃ viśeṣadvayena viśiṣṭaṃ paridīpitam- vastuviśeṣaḥ kṣetraviśeṣaśca /
SA14kamvchtu:1387: praṇītastu loke dūrlabhatvena khyātaḥ yadāha saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1391: yathā vastutathatā tathā bhāṣitatvāt niruktyā tathā ukta iti kathyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1399: tatra pūrvaṃ tāvat parasya phalam athavā aparaṃ tu pūrvasya vyākhyānam /
SA14kamvchtu:1400: deśayet iti śabdaṃ samprakāśayet iti chandam adhimuktimutpādayedityarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1409: yadaivaṃ pudgalanairātmyagāthāmātropadeśenāpi caityabhūtyabhūto jāyate kiṃ khalu punaḥ nairātmyadvayopadeśena ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1412: vācayiṣyanti iti pustakagatam paryavāpsyanti iti artham /
SA14kamvchtu:1415: cintāmayyā bhāvanāmayyā prajñayā codgṛhītatvād yoniśaśca (manasi kariṣyanti) ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1422: sa eva sākṣād dharamāṇabuddha iveti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1423: guru iti mañjughoṣādyanyataraḥ kaścit tatkāryasādhanāya dharmabhāṇakaḥ sthānīyarūpeṇa draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1430: tasminnanurāgaṃ parityajya dharmaṃ pratipattuṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca darśite /
SA14kamvchtu:1431: ito dharmaparyāyād ityupalakṣaṇamātraparikīrtanena bāhyaśāstreṣvanurāgaṃ parivarjya sarvasaddharmān prati yatna āstheya iti paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1432: acintyasāmarthyanvitatvādayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ nāmamātraśravaṇenāpi parānupakarotīti sattvānāṃ puṇyotpādakathanāya āryasubhūtiḥ ko nāma ayam iti pṛṣṭavān /
SA14kamvchtu:1433: - [Vajraṭ_158] kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi ityanena asyodgrahaṇenāpyaprameyapuṇyaṃ bhavatīti paridīpyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1434: prajñāpāramitā nāma iti yasyā tannāma tattathā ucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1437: prajñā ca sā pāramitā ceti samāsaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1440: sā cārthataḥ sarvavidhaprajñāsu uttamā tāthāgatī prajñā nānyadā prajñayā pāraṃ parimāpayituṃ śakyam /
SA14kamvchtu:1447: tasyāśca bhagavatāḥ pratyātmavedyatvenāsādhāraṇatvāt paramārthataścānutpannatvāt sā śabdenābhidhātuṃ na śakyata ityāśayena vitarkya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1451: paramārthataḥ pratyātmavedyatvenāsādhāraṇatvāt paramārthataśca sarvadharmāṇām atyantānutpannatvāt ca sā na śabdenābhidheyā,
SA14kamvchtu:1455: tasmāt vikalpapratibimbabhūtā yā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatena deśitā,
SA14kamvchtu:1460: tato bhrāntapratīteḥ sa vikalpapratibimbo naiva bhedenāvagamyate,
SA14kamvchtu:1461: ato jñānasvabhāvatvena saiva paramārthaprajñā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1463: athavā yā tāthāgatī prajñā pratītirūpatvena tathāgatena bhāṣitā saiva paramārthato na vidyate,
SA14kamvchtu:1465: eva iti śabdastu apāramitā ityetadanantaraṃ draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1466: anena paramārthatvaṃ pratipādya tatra yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:1467: yathā prajñāpāramitā vikalpapratibimbātmikaiva bāhyatvena samāropya bhagavatā bhāṣitā,
SA14kamvchtu:1468: tathaiva sarve dharmā api nānyathā tathāgatena kathitā iti deśanārthamāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1473: ata eva ca paramārthataḥ 'nāsti kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ';
SA14kamvchtu:1474: iti vijñāya sthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ no hīdaṃ bhagavan,
SA14kamvchtu:1475: nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1476: anena vikṣepanigrahaḥ gāmbhīryaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe bhavataḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1480: tathāpi ye tāvad ādikarmikāḥ kathaṃ sarvadharmeṣu nairātmyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti cintayanti,
SA14kamvchtu:1482: atra dvividhena upāyena ekānekasvabhāvaviyogādhigamāt sarvadharmanairātmyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti darśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1484: tatra yāvat pṛthivīrajo bhavet ityanena ekasvabhāvaviyogādhigamāt tanūkaraṇopāyo nirdiśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1488: ata eva paramāṇuvibhāvanāyāṃ sattyāmekatvaṃ prahīyata eveti /
SA14kamvchtu:1491: te ca paramāṇavo 'pi yadi digbhāgabhedena bhinnatvādasiddhā eva syuḥ, (tarhiṃ)
SA14kamvchtu:1496: bahu tat pṛthivīrajo 'pi yaḥ paramāṇusvabhāva uktastadekatvagrahaṇaniṣedhāt tadaraja eva /
SA14kamvchtu:1503: anyathā paramārthastasyāsattvād anabhilāpyatvācca svalakṣaṇaṃ nābhilapyata ityevamabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1507: evañcāntaśaḥ paramāṇūnāmapi yuktyā pratyekaṃ parikṣyamāṇānāṃ pratītāveva sattvāt pratīyate lokadhātūnāṃ cānekasvaviyuktatvam,
SA14kamvchtu:1510: evaṃ khalu bhājanalokasya ekānekasvabhāvaviyogena niḥsvabhāvatvamṝ evamabhidhāya sattvalokasyāpyabhidhānārtha yo 'sau lokadhātuḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1513: adhātuḥ saḥ iti ekānekasvabhāvarahitaḥ sa ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1514: evaṃ yo hi rūpaskandhaḥ sa bhājanalokatvenābhihitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1515: śeṣāścatvāraḥ skandhāstu yathaikānekasvabhāvena viyuktāstathā pūrvaṃ vivecitā eva /
SA14kamvchtu:1516: evaṃ sati paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvāt sarve dharmā māyopamā dṛśyante yogibhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1519: tatprahāṇārthaṃ ca chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe /
SA14kamvchtu:1520: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau iti nimittamātrābhidhānena sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvabhāvanā sandarśitā /
SA14kamvchtu:1521: arajastat iti adhātuḥ ityābhyāṃ paramārthavyavasthāpanayā yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti tat paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1522: tenocyate lokadhātuḥ ityanenāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1525: samprati ye bodhisattvāḥ puṇyasambhārapratipattaye 'tyantamupakāritvād bhagavantaṃ pūjayeyusteṣāṃ tasya (bhagavataḥ)
SA14kamvchtu:1528: tasmāt teṣāṃ sambhārāsañcayato viyogārthaṃ ekādaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādi /
SA14kamvchtu:1537: atrārthataḥ rūpakāye tathāgatābhiniveśaṃ vipakṣatvena nirdiśya tatprahānārthaṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ cāpi pradarśite /
SA14kamvchtu:1542_0: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyāvagamopāye nirdiṣṭe 'pi kāyajīviteṣvāsajya ye lābhasatkārādhyasitāḥ
SA14kamvchtu:1545: anena cāsāre 'nekaśatasahasraduḥkhaikasthānatucchātmabhāve tasmin snihyan etāvacchariraparityāgenāpi yatpuṇyaṃ na prāptam,
SA14kamvchtu:1549: tatprahāṇāya saddharmasamādānāya ca chandaḥ praṇidhānañcāpi nirdiṣṭe /
SA14kamvchtu:1553: āryasubhūtiḥ aśrūṇi prāmuñcat tadapi bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānenānyeṣu kusīdeṣu janeṣu adbhutamahāyānadharmasyābhidhānena paramaśraddhotpādārthe draṣṭavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:1554: tasmād hastena aśrūṇi pramṛjya bhagavantametadavocat āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
SA14kamvchtu:1559: yataḥ ityāryasatyagocarajñānotpādamārabhya etatparyantaṃ dharmaparyāyasya paramapuṇyaphalasya yathoktā deśanā śrāvaka-pratyekabuddhanāmagocarā naivaṃ śrutapūrvetyarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1561: evaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ puṇyaṃ śrutvā yeṣāṃ vīryamārabhya pravṛttānāmasmin dharme yathārutasaṃjñā bhavati teṣāṃ taddoṣaparijihīrṣayā parameṇāścaryeṇa ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1572: asatsu ca saṃjñeyeṣu saṃjñāyā apyabhāvaḥ prasajyeta,
SA14kamvchtu:1573: tasmāt kathaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvaṃ sidhyedityupālambhaṃ vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1579: ata eva nocyate bhūtasaṃjñeyaṃ bhūtasaṃjñātveneti darśitam,
SA14kamvchtu:1580: yato hyavicāraramaṇīyamātrataḥ vidyate tasmāt tāṃ tathāgato bhāṣate bhūtasaṃjñā,
SA14kamvchtu:1583: kathaṃ ca vikṣepo nigrahītavya ityubhayaṃ darśitaṃ gāmbhīryañcāpi nigaditam,
SA14kamvchtu:1589: sattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime [Vajraṭ_165] samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ ye imaṃ bhagavan,
SA14kamvchtu:1594: atrāyaṃ sāmānyena samāsārthaḥ- anāgate saddharmavipralopakāle ye bodhisattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
SA14kamvchtu:1596: mayyapyevaṃ sambhāvanāyāṃ saddharmotthānakāle 'pi yuṣmākametādṛśapratipattyabhāve idamatyantaṃ lajjāsthānaṃ tat syādityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1599: bhāṣyamāṇam iti tu sākṣāt prākāśyamānaṃ bhagavatā,
SA14kamvchtu:1605_0: taccaivaṃ nirucyate- pudgalanairātmyamātramavaganturmama bhagavataḥ sakāśāt sākṣāt
SA14kamvchtu:1607: kalpeṣu asmin [dharme] dhāraṇādikrameṇa īdṛśaṃ dharmaparyāyamadhigamya paryavāpsyanti te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
SA14kamvchtu:1611: etena kausīdyaṃ prahāya saddharmagrahaṇādau chandena praṇidhānena ca sthātavyamityādarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1613: pratipattisampadamapi darśayitum api tu khalu punarbhagavan ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1619: yadyanātmādikaṃ sat tadā saṃjñāpi tatra niyamena pravartayediti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1622: tasyā api parikṣākṣamatvādakiñcanatve sati ātmādyanubhavābhāvādasatyāḥ kā kathā /
SA14kamvchtu:1624: nanu cāsattve satyātmādestadviparyayeṇa nātmasaṃjñā pravartiṣyata iti kuta ityābhyantarotthitaṃ praśnaṃ vicārya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1632: tasmāt buddhairbhagavadbhiryathā sarvasaṃjñāpagatatvaṃ śikṣitaṃ tathā bodhisattvairapi śikṣitavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:1633: tasmād ye bodhisattvāstasyāmanuśikṣante teṣāmātmādisaṃjñā niyamato na pravartate /
SA14kamvchtu:1634: [Vajraṭ_167] evametat iti vineyānāṃ niścayāpādanārthaṃ svayamabhyupagamya bhagavatā dviruktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1637: ataḥ prathamataramanārabdhavīryāṇāṃ teṣām anārabdhavīryatvāpanayanārthaṃ ye sattvāḥ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1640: mahāyāne tu tadapi dharmamātraṃ mithyeti deśitam,
SA14kamvchtu:1641: tasmād anādikālīnasahajātmadṛṣṭisamprayuktāntaḥkaraṇā abhāvitātmānaḥ pudgalanairātmyaṃ śrutvā nāstyahamiti trasiṣyanti /
SA14kamvchtu:1646: iti matvā daśadigavalokanenāpi śaraṇābhāvāt santrāse tadapākaraṇāya na santrasiṣyanti ityuddiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:1649: anye tāvannairātmyadvayānavabodhād yo hi trāso mṛdu-madhyādhimātrātmakaḥ sa ebhistribhiḥ padaiḥ yathākramamudīrita ityevaṃ manyante,
SA14kamvchtu:1651: samprati lābhasatkāreṣu vītarāgatvāt 'te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyantīti /
SA14kamvchtu:1652: '; śrotukāmānāṃ hitāya svayaṃ pūrvaṃ praśnamuthyāpya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1656: na kevalaṃ mayaiveyaṃ paramā paramā proktā,
SA14kamvchtu:1657: [Vajraṭ_168] api tu sarvabuddhairapīyaṃ parametyukteti darśanārthaṃ yāṃ ca paramapāramitāṃ iti nigaditam /
SA14kamvchtu:1658: anena 'ekabuiddhena deśitamapi aviparītārthatvena gṛhyate sarvabuddhaikābhipretatve khalu kimucyatām';
SA14kamvchtu:1663: anena paramatvadarśanena hriyaḥ dvitīyaṃ sthānaṃ nirdiśyate,
SA14kamvchtu:1665: śreṣṭhastathāpi tvaṃ yallābhasatkārādhyavasitaḥ pramādena sthitastadatīva lajjājanakamityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1668: evaṃ hrīsthāne deśite 'pi ye duḥkhe 'kṣāntyā vīryātiśayamārabdhuṃ notsahante,
SA14kamvchtu:1669: teṣāṃ duḥkhākṣāntervyapagamārthaṃ trayodaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha apia tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādi /
SA14kamvchtu:1677: ataḥ yā tathāgatasya kṣāntipāramitā saiva apāramitā ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1684: evaṃ paramārthato 'nutpannatvāt nāsti tatra pāraṃ gatetyabhisandhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1685: anena tasyāḥ kṣānteḥ svabhāvenānutpannatvaṃ gāmbhīryaṃ cāpi darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1686: evaṃ sarvadharmānupalambhamanasikāreṇa kutaḥ bodhisattvānāṃ kṣāntiriti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1687: iti jñāpakahetau pṛṣṭe yadā subhūte ityādyattaramāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1696: nanu asatyāñca kasyāñcit saṃjñāyāṃ mūrcchāvasthāvad cittābhāvo bhaviṣyatīti cet?
SA14kamvchtu:1697: tatra nāpi asaṃjñā vā babhūva ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1699: tacca kathamiti cittagataṃ praśnaṃ vikalpya svayaṃ tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1712: anayoḥ sampratibaddhāḥ sarve doṣāḥ prajāyante // iti //
SA14kamvchtu:1714: yena kṣāntibalena kaliṅgarājā eva sattvaḥ narakaṃ gamiṣyatītyabhipretam /
SA14kamvchtu:1715: anena kṛtāpakāre 'pi [Vajraṭ_170] sati nirvikāratayā niyataṃ vyāpādādisambhavābhāvatayā ātmādisaṃjñāvyapagamahetutayā ca īdṛśyāḥ kṣānterjñānamādarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1718: aṅga-pratyaṅga ityanena duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntiḥ me tasmin samaye ityādinā ca dharmanidhyānakṣāntiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1719: anena dharmapudgalavikalpayorvipakṣatayā nirdeśena vineyāstatprahāṇe yathoktakṣāntyutpāde samyaggrahaṇe cāvataranti /
SA14kamvchtu:1720: tadevam, vineyajanāḥ 'yadā bhagavāneva bodhyarthamevaṃvidhāṃ parāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvitavān,
SA14kamvchtu:1730: sā ca kṣāntiḥ dvividhā dīpitānirantaraparāpakāraduḥkhaviṣayikā parāpakārāsahyaduḥkhaviṣayikā ca /
SA14kamvchtu:1738: samastenānena asahyaprahāṇāt bodhau chandena [Vajraṭ_171] praṇidhānena ca sthātavyamiti darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1739: bodhicittotpāde sati na kenāpi saṃsāraduḥkhena spṛṣṭo bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1740: bodhicittotpāde 'pi ātmābhiniviṣṭatayā trividhaduḥkhasaṃjñābhiḥ santrasya kadācit punarnotpādaḥ syādataḥ sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvā ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1742: rūpādyabhiniveśena śrāvakādivat saṃsāraṃ parikalpya tadduḥkhasantaptāḥ na kadācidapi bodhicittamutpādayanti,
SA14kamvchtu:1744: rūpādiṣu satābhiniveśo hi tatra pratiṣṭhita iti pūrvavadatrāpyuktaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1750: na kvacit pratiṣṭhitam ityanena rūpādiṣu nāmamātrasattābhiniveśaḥ pratiṣidhyate,
SA14kamvchtu:1753: yaduta asatāṃ vitathābhiniveśasya prahāṇārthaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate?
SA14kamvchtu:1754: iti cittotthitaṃ praśnaṃ vitarkya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1757: atrāyamarthaḥ- anādikālastaccitaṃ rūpādiṣu bhāvābhiniveśabalena rūpādau pratiṣṭhitam,
SA14kamvchtu:1759: sa tasya rūpādivastuno 'bhāvāt paramārthato na pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1760: tasmādeva ityanenopasaṃhāreṇātra dvitīye pakṣe pratisṭhitatvameva darśitaṃ bhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:1762: dvitīyāsahyavastuna pratipakṣatvena api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1764: te 'pi sattvā yadi paramārthato na syuḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1766: kathaṃ te tathāvidheṣu mithyāpravṛtteṣu sattveṣu khinnā bhaveyuḥ [Vajraṭ_172] ityādarśitam /

SA14kamvchtu:2185: so 'pi tathaiva vaktavyaḥ ityabhimānitvānnocyate sa bodhisattva ityarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2190: anena kṣetravyūheṣu māyopamatvādhimuktyā bodhisattvena kathaṃ sthātavyamityetad darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2192: bhagavatā kathamuktā iti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2195: pūrvaṃ tāvadadhimukticaryābhūmisthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bodhisattvakṣetrapariśuddhau praṇidhānāvasthāyāṃ bodhisattvavikalpasya niṣedhārtham (uktāḥ)
SA14kamvchtu:2196: , samprati buddhekṣetrapariśuddhipariniṣpattaye ye bodhisattvā evaṃvidhenābhiniveśena pravartante,
SA14kamvchtu:2201: aneneha bodhisattvena kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ tad vyapadiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:2202: kīdṛśo bodhisattvo nāmetyatra yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvaḥ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2203: nirātmāno dharmāḥ iti dviruktayā dvividhena nairātmyena sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyaṃ darśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2204: bodhisattvo bodhisattvaḥ iti dviruktyā tadeva dvividhaṃ nairātmyajñānaṃ darśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2216: yadi nāsti bodhisattvo nāmaḥ kaścid dharmaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2217: tadā tathāgataḥ pariśuddhadarśanena pariśuddhajñānena ca yukta eva na bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:2221: tasmād yasyāṃ saṃnipatitatāyāṃ pariṣadhevaṃ vikalpo bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:2222: tasyāḥ kṛte pariśuddhaṃ darśanaṃ jñānañcetyanuttaradvayamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2224: anena paramārthataḥ bodhisattvo nāma sa kaścid dharmo na bhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:2225: tathāpi saṃvṛtau puṇyajñānasambhāraṃ paripūrya pariśuddhaṃjñānadarśanābhyāṃ yastathāgato bhavati, (tena)
SA14kamvchtu:2227: anyathā saṃvṛtāvapi yadi sa na bhavet tadā kastathāgato bhavedityevaṃ tāvat darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2228: tatra saṃvidyate tathāgatasya prajñācakṣuḥ ityeva tāvannocyate, (api tu)
SA14kamvchtu:2236: pañcavidhaṃ cakṣuḥ kramaśaḥ- tatra sthūlaviṣayatvāt prathamaṃ rūpagrāhakaṃ kathitam,
SA14kamvchtu:2237: paramārthavaśena saṃvṛtijñānaṃ pariśuddhadhyatītyataḥ pūrvaṃ paramārthasatyagrāhakaṃ paścācca saṃvṛtisatyagrāhakamabhihitamiti saṅgacchate kramanirdeśaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2240: na tu pudgala iti pudgalaśūnye dharmamātre dharmacakṣuḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2259: evaṃ sati kathaṃ prajñāsyete tathāgatasya māṃsacakṣurādividyamānatā cittadhārā ceti cittāśayaṃ viditvā tatkasya hetoḥ? ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2264: anyathā paramārthataḥ sarvavāggocarātītatvānna vaktuṃ śakṣyata ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2266: māṃsacakṣurādīnyapi cakṣuḥsvabhāvarahitānyeva uktānīti kathanaṃ prakṛtaṃ sākṣānnoktam /
SA14kamvchtu:2267: atra kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamiti tadabhidhātumāha tatkasya hetoḥ? iti /
SA14kamvchtu:2273: yathā traikālikacittasya paramārthato 'bhāvastathā pūrvamuktaṃ vakṣyate ca /
SA14kamvchtu:2280: yadi nāsti traikālikaṃ cittaṃ tadā puṇyaskandho 'pi na syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:2282: tataḥ tathāgatasya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadaṃ sampādayituṃ kathaṃ bodhisattvo yatnaṃ kūryāditi vicintya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2283: anena kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yo 'ntaśo ratnādikaṃ bāhyavastu tyajati, so 'pi (yadi)
SA14kamvchtu:2285: kathaṃ na tathāgatasya asaṃkhyeyāprameyakalpeṣu duṣkarānekaśatānyabhyasyataḥ puṇyaskandhādhipatyaṃ syādityevaṃ deśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2286: ata eva paramārthato 'satyapi puṇyaskandhe saṃvṛtau sattvād bodhisattvena tatra vaśībhāvaṃ niṣpādayituṃ chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamityādarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2288: kathaṃ na paramārthataḥ puṇyaskandhasattvaṃ vyavasthāpyata iti vicintya 'bodhisattvenātra kathaṃ pratipattavyam,
SA14kamvchtu:2295: anena tathāgatasya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadaṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ prasthitena bodhisattvena paramārthatastadanupalambhena yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:2300: yadi puṇyaskandho naiva syāt tadā tathāgatānāṃ dvividhā kāyalakṣaṇasampad-anuvyañjanakāyasampad,
SA14kamvchtu:2304_0: tasmāt tathāgatasya dvividhāṃ kāyasampadaṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ kathaṃ bodhisattvairyatno
SA14kamvchtu:2304_1: 'nuṣṭheya iti vicintayadbhyastathāgatasya rūpakāyasampadamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2307: tato 'yamatrāryasubhūterāśayaḥ- yathā paramārthato 'skandha eva puṇyaskandhastathā rūpakāyo 'pyunutpanna eva /
SA14kamvchtu:2308: ataḥ paramārthataḥ na rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2312: tasmād bodhisattvena māyānirmitabuddhasya tathāvidharūpādhimuktayā tatpratipattaye chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2314: pūrvamadhimukticaryābhūmau rūpakāyāptikāmatākāle tathāgatapūjāsatkārakāle ca tathāvidho 'bhiniveśaḥ parivarjitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2315_1: samprasthitasya bodhisattvasya rūpe 'bhiniveśo bhavatīti yāsāṃ prasiddhistāsāṃ pariṣadāṃ
SA14kamvchtu:2316: evaṃ tarhi tathāgatānāṃ rūpakāyaḥ kasmād deśita iti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:2318: na rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ityanena yojanīyam /
SA14kamvchtu:2326: anena cāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyam, (iti)
SA14kamvchtu:2329: saṃvṛtau tathāgatasya rūpakāyasampadaṃ niṣpādayituṃ bodhisattvaiḥ karaṇīyānāṃ yatnānāṃ nidarśanena ādāryamapi dīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2334: yadi rūpakāyapariniṣpattyāa na tathāgato draṣṭavya iti cet,
SA14kamvchtu:2337: ato [Vajraṭ_198] bodhisattavaistathāgatasya vāksampadaṃ niṣpādayituṃ kathaṃ yatnaḥ karttavya iti vicintayadbhyo vāksampadamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2338: paramārthato vācya-vācaka-vacanānāmabhāvāt na tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati mayā dharmo deśita iti /
SA14kamvchtu:2342: vacanāni karaṇarūpāṇi śabdasvabhāvābhāvātmakāni vā tathā vistareṇa prāgevoktāni /
SA14kamvchtu:2350: kathaṃ tadabhūtamālapituṃ śakyata iti vicāraṇāyāmāha asatodgṛhītena iti /
SA14kamvchtu:2352: anena tathāgatasya vāksampadi pravṛttena bodhisattvena pratiśrutkādivajjñātvā pravartitavyamiti,
SA14kamvchtu:2355: pudgaladharmanairātmyadeśakena bhagavatā nānāpadavākyātmikeyaṃ dharmadeśanā kathaṃ prasidhyati?
SA14kamvchtu:2360: bhaveyuriti cintāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ? iti pṛṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:2365: sarvaṃ pāramārthikaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tāvat pūrvameva vistareṇa nirākṛtam /
SA14kamvchtu:2366: na ca dbitīyo 'pi [Vajraṭ_199] asati svalakṣaṇe ādhārasyābhāvena kasyacidapyasattvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2367: sāmānyadravyatvābhyupagame svalakṣaṇa eva saṅgṛhītaṃ syāditi tanniṣedhena tasyāpi niṣedha eva /
SA14kamvchtu:2368: anyavyāvṛttyā sāmānyalakṣaṇamadhyāropitasvabhāvamiti parikalpite sati dharmadeśanāyā nairarthakyatvena siddhasādhanam /
SA14kamvchtu:2370: paramārthataḥ svalakṣaṇasattve 'pi na yujyate tayā dharmadeśanā /
SA14kamvchtu:2371: sphoṭādiśabdasya nityasvabhāvasya paraiḥ padatvena parikalpitasya kramākramābhyāmarthakriyākāritvaṃ tāvad virudhyate,
SA14kamvchtu:2374: anityasyāpi tāvat svalakṣaṇasva na yujyate padatvam,
SA14kamvchtu:2376: na hi yujyate anyasya saṅketo 'nyasya ca vyavahāraḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2378: ata eva svalakṣaṇamapyabhidhātuṃ na yujyate, ananvayāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2379: sāmānyapadārthe 'bhidheyatvenābhyupagate sati abhidheyasvabhāvatvena tasya svalakṣaṇasvarūpatvānna hi pradeśāntaragamanam /
SA14kamvchtu:2380: ekatvaṃ tu deśakālādibhinnāsvanekavyaktiṣvanugatamapi na yujyate tathā hi- (atha)
SA14kamvchtu:2381: ekasyāṃ vyaktau sarvātmanā vyāptaṃ syāt tadā yena ekatvena parikalpitaḥ sa svabhāvastena anyatrādhigatetaravyaktibhiḥ sambaddhaḥ taditarasvabhāvastatra na bhavediti,
SA14kamvchtu:2384: evaṃ yāvatyo bhinnavyaktayastāsāmekadeśena vyāptivyavasthayā tāvatīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ syāttadā ekavyaktigrahaṇaṃ tāvadekadeśagrahaṇena yuktaṃ bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:2385: bhinnavyaktiṣu deśakālaparimāṇādibhinnāsu tāsvekavyaktigrahaṇaṃ tāvadekadeśagrahaṇād yugapudgrahaṇābhāva eva /
SA14kamvchtu:2389: yena yena hi nāmnā vai yo yo dharmo 'bhilapyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2391: na sa saṃvidyate tatra dharmāṇāṃ sā hi dharmatā //
SA14kamvchtu:2408: tatredānīmevaṃ gambhīradharmo 'yamanāgate kāle ghanībhūte kudṛṣṭijāle kathaṃ saphalo bhaviṣyatīti nābhiśraddhadhanti parivārāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2409: ya evaṃ cintayanti teṣāmaviśrambhaṃ nivārayitum āryasubhūtiścittasampatsu smṛtyupasthānamadhikṛtya bhagavan ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2410: bhagavatāpyanāgate 'dhvani śīlavanto guṇavantaśca bhaviṣyantīti kiṃ noktapūrvam /
SA14kamvchtu:2411: samprati teṣāṃ sattve 'sattve vā ekāntenānabhiniveśaṃ deśayitum asti iti noktam,
SA14kamvchtu:2414: paramārthataḥ skandhapudgalādīnāṃ satsvabhāvānupalambhāt na sattvāḥ ityanenādhyāropāntaniṣedhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2416_0: bhaviṣyanti ityanayā deśanayā bhagavataḥ kīdṛgaviparītasmṛtyupasthānamiti sattvebhyo
SA14kamvchtu:2419: yadi na te sattvāḥ syustadā kathaṃ bhagavatā 'bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani śīlavanto guṇavantaśca te';
SA14kamvchtu:2430: yadi na syād bhagavataḥ kācidapi dharmadeśanā,
SA14kamvchtu:2432: samyaksambuddho 'pi tatastathāgatābhisambodhisiddhaye vyarthaḥ syād bodhisattvānāṃ yatnaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2434: ato deśanāpi bhavatīti manvānebhyaḥ [Vajraṭ_202] tebhyo 'bhisambodhim adhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2435: āryasubhūtiḥ pūrvābhiprāyaṃ gṛhītvā nāsti saḥ ityudatarat /
SA14kamvchtu:2436: tadevaṃ manyate- paramārthābhiprāyeṇa bhagavatā dharmadeśanā pratiṣiddheti /
SA14kamvchtu:2448: idānīṃ buddhabhūmiparyeṣaṇakāle pareṣāṃ tādṛgvikalpanirākaraṇānna bhavati punaruktidoṣaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2452: bhagavatā grāhyasvarūpasya svalakṣaṇasya sūkṣmo 'pi dharmasvabhāvo nopalabdhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2462: sāmprataṃ pudgalanairātmyāvabodhasvabhāvaṃ pratipādayituṃ api tu khalu punaḥ sūbhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2463: samāḥ sa dharmaḥ iti tadavabodhiteṣu sarvadharmeṣu pudgalanairātmyasāmyāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2464: na tatra kiñcidviṣamam iti sarvatra tadaviparyayāt,
SA14kamvchtu:2469: kena rūpeṇa samaḥ sa dharma ityatra niḥsattvatvena ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2470: anena sarveṇa kathaṃ yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti tannirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:2484: iti vicāryamāṇe mahārthadharmatayā prajñāpitatvena tatsattāṃ darśayituṃ yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte [Vajraṭ_204] ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2486: anantalokadhātūn ratnaiḥ paripūrya dānena yat puṇyaṃ tadapi upamāṃ naiva kṣamate /
SA14kamvchtu:2487: itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ ityupalakṣaṇamātraparidīpanena sakalo mahāyānadharmaḥ parilakṣito bhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:2488: yāvad iti vacanena sahasratamī kalā- 'śatasahasratamī kalā .......... upamā-aupamyamityetāni';
SA14kamvchtu:2490: evaṃ mahārthadharmaprajñapanena hetunā bhagavataścittasampadaḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ ānuttaryamavagamyate,
SA14kamvchtu:2501: bhagavato lokottarajñānāvasthāyāṃ sattvasaṃjñā sarvathā na pravartate,
SA14kamvchtu:2504_1: sattvādisaṃjñā na pravartata iti tannirdiśya avavādamahārthatvena prajñaptihetunā
SA14kamvchtu:2505: praśnasyottaramapratīkṣamāṇaḥ sapadi svataḥ na khalu punaḥ subhūte,
SA14kamvchtu:2507: tasmād bhagavataścittasampadastādṛśe mahārthāvavādahetau bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:2508: kiṃ sattvānāṃ sattve 'pi saṃkleśahetubhūtatayā tathā nābhipreyate tathāgatena?
SA14kamvchtu:2509: āhosvit sattvābhāvāditi cintayatāmāśayaṃ vijñāya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:2511: skandhātmakasya pudgalātmakasya ca kasyacit sattvasya paramārthato 'bhāvād evaṃ nopalabhyata iti darśayitumāha- nāstiṃ kaścit sattvo yastathāgatena parimocittaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:2512: anena bodhisattvaiḥ kathamatra yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti tannirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:2513: abhāvaḥ kathaṃ jñātavya ityatra yadi punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2516: tasmād yadi sattvaḥ syāt tadā sandṛśyeta sa tathāgatena,
SA14kamvchtu:2518: sa eva tāvattasya pragāḍhaḥ ātmagrāhaḥ syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2519: tataśca ātmagrāhahetutaḥ samutpannaṃ nikhilakleśajālabandhanamapyatidṛḍhaṃ syāt tadā rāgādyatipragāḍhabaddhasya āvaraṇāprahāṇena bhagavataḥ tathāgatapadaprāptirna syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2528: ātmādivastuna eva grahaṇaṃ syāttadā prahīṇāvaraṇasya tasya bhagavata [Vajraṭ_206] ātmagrāhaḥ samudbhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:2534: pṛthagjanā api kecit sacchāstraṃ śrutvā yoniśomanaskārasthitāḥ dharmanairātmyādhimuktāḥ satyamabhiniviśante,
SA14kamvchtu:2536: bālamātrakathanāt skandhādyabhijñā api tādṛśāḥ pṛthagjanā anupajātāryamārgatayā bālā eva /
SA14kamvchtu:2537: bālānāṃ vaiśiṣṭayamabhidhātuṃ vyāvṛtte 'pyātmagrāhe bālatvena teṣvātmagrāha ityavabhāsate,
SA14kamvchtu:2542: yadyātmā na syāttadā ke tāvat pṛthagjanā abhidhīyeran?
SA14kamvchtu:2547: anena sarveṇa tāvat sākṣād gāmbhīryaṃ proktam /
SA14kamvchtu:2554: tadabhāve mūlabhāvāt kathaṃ bhaveyuḥ tādṛyastathāgatakāyasampada iti?
SA14kamvchtu:2555: ye pāriṣadyāḥ [Vajraṭ_207] kṛtānalpavikalpāḥ rūpādiṣu bhāvābhiniveśenaivaṃ cintayanti,
SA14kamvchtu:2556: tebhyo dharmakāyaparigrahamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2559: lakṣaṇasampadā tāvat paramārthavicāraṇāyāmavayavinaḥ paramāṇusaṃghātasya vā svabhāvenānupapattiṃ viditvā pūrvakamevābhiprāyaṃ gṛhṇan subhūtirāha no hīdam /
SA14kamvchtu:2560: evameva upapattyantaraṃ bhagavatā sacet punaḥ subhūte ityādinoktam /
SA14kamvchtu:2561: yadi tathāgato lakṣaṇasampanmātreṇa prabhāvitaḥ syāt tadā vakṣyamāṇahetunā tulyatvād rājāpi cakravartī kathaṃ na bhavet tathāgataḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:2564: tataḥ sa nocyate tathāgata ityapi na yujyate,
SA14kamvchtu:2566: tena yadi tathāgato jaḍasvabhāvairlakṣaṇādidharmaiḥ prabhāvito 'bhaviṣyat tadā cakravartī api tathāgato 'bhaviṣyat iti cet?
SA14kamvchtu:2567: na, tasmāttathāgastāvad aśeṣavastusvabhāvasya yathāvadadhigamamātreṇa prabhāvita ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2568: anena tathāvidhaṃ jñānahetukaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ prati bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:2569: adhunā paramārthatastattathāgatajñāne 'pi nābhiniveṣṭavyamiti darśayituṃ dharmakāyo [Vajraṭ_208] vyavasthāpyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2570: bodhisattvena kathaṃ yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti dvābhyāṃ gāthābhyāṃ pradarśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2571: tatra pūrvagāthayā kathaṃ tathāgato na draṣṭavyaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2577: rūpeṇa cādrākṣuḥ ityanena rūpe 'bhiniviṣṭāḥ pudgalāḥ pāramārthikalakṣaṇādibhiralaṅkṛtaṃ dharmarūpaṃ pudgalarūpaṃ ca paśyantīti vyavahāraprajñaptirnidiṣṭā /
SA14kamvchtu:2578: ghoṣeṇa cānvayuḥ iti māṃ śabdena evameva sa tathāgata iti jñātavanta ityarthaḥ /
